user_query: I'm planning a company event and I want to engage the attendees with some interactive content. Can you fetch the latest posts from the 'memes' subreddit and display them on a screen? Additionally, provide me with a random programming meme to share on social media.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest posts from the 'memes' subreddit.
Display the fetched meme posts on a screen for attendees to view.
Fetch a random programming meme from the memes subreddit.
Share the fetched programming meme on social media.
